message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1300000. This is a competitive price considering its value to you is $1500000.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. This is the value you've mentioned the product has to you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm not willing to go that low. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll sell it to you for $1250000. This is the best I can do.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. Considering the product's value to you is $1200000, I'm willing to meet you at $1200000. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
